text.div:
Generated Narrative: CodeSystem afib-flutter-status-cs

This case-insensitive code system http://testSK.org/CodeSystem/afib-flutter-status-cs defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
detected DetectedIndicates that atrial fibrillation or flutter has been identified during screening or recent evaluation.
known-af Known AFSignifies that the patient has a pre-existing, documented diagnosis of atrial fibrillation.
no-af No AFDenotes that the patient does not exhibit atrial fibrillation or atrial flutter.
not-screened Not ScreenedMeans that no screening for atrial fibrillation or flutter has been performed.

name: AfibFlutterStatusCS
title: Atrial Fibrillation or Flutter Status Codes
description: Codes representing the status of Atrial Fibrillation or Flutter assessment.

concept.definition: Indicates that atrial fibrillation or flutter has been identified during screening or recent evaluation.
Signifies that the patient has a pre-existing, documented diagnosis of atrial fibrillation.
Denotes that the patient does not exhibit atrial fibrillation or atrial flutter.
Means that no screening for atrial fibrillation or flutter has been performed.
